content: no sew pop-it octopus thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size 6 inches tall x 6 inches wide materials ~200 yards worsted weight #4 yarn 3 5mm hook yarn needle scissors gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms chain -chain skip -skip st -stitch slip_stitch -slip_stitch blo -back loop only single_crochet -single_crochet increase -increase two single crochets in same stitch pattern notes this pattern is constructed in 10 parts 8 arms 2 bodies this pattern is worked in continuous rounds # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items arms make 8 round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 r2 *increase* 6 times 12 r3-4 single_crochet in each st around r5 *in blo in the same stitch half_double_crochet chain 1 half_double_crochet through both loops single_crochet in next two stitches* 4 times slip_stitch in next stitch slip_stitch in chain 1 space r6 skip 1 st 3 double_crochet in next 2 stitches skip 1 st slip_stitch into chain 1 space fasten_off body make 2 note if you want to use 8 colors change to a new color every 2 row r1 6sc in magic_ring 6 r2 *increase* 6 times 12 r3 *increase single_crochet* 6 times 18 r4 *increase 2 single_crochet* 6 times 24 r5 *increase 3 single_crochet* 6 times 30 r6 *increase 4 single_crochet* 6 times 36 r7 *increase 5 single_crochet* 6 times 42 r8 *increase 6 single_crochet* 6 times 48 r9-16 8 rounds single_crochet in each st around at round 16 fasten_off first body do not fasten off second body assembly turn first body inside out and place inside second body 1st body right side facing in move 1st body down into 2nd body 2nd body right side facing out designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items place flat edge of first leg between the two bodies slip_stitch through all 3 layers for 6 stitches chain 1 space s on arm count as stitch at the end of 6 stitches add the next arm continue until all arms are attached do not fasten_off you will now single_crochet around all the arms chain 1 place a single_crochet in each st of the side of arm and place 2sc in each of the six double crochets place a single_crochet in each st of the side of arm in the last stitch of the arm decrease the last stitch of the arm to the first stitch of next arm together repeat around join fasten_off embroider faces on both bodies designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items reference photo enjoy your new pop-it octopus
